<a name="l00036"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#cefc50668d23d3c4c936b7d54f488214">00036</a> <a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>* <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#cefc50668d23d3c4c936b7d54f488214">current_stack</a> = NULL;
<a name="l00037"></a>00037 
<a name="l00038"></a>00038 <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keywordtype">unsigned</span> <span class="keywordtype">char</span> initialized = 0;
<a name="l00039"></a>00039 
<a name="l00040"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">00040</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>()
<a name="l00041"></a>00041 {
<a name="l00042"></a>00042 
<a name="l00043"></a>00043         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (!initialized) {
<a name="l00044"></a>00044                 <span class="comment">//Initialize all 3 stacks</span>
<a name="l00045"></a>00045                 modelview_matrix_stack = (<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>*) malloc(<span class="keyword">sizeof</span>(<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>));
<a name="l00046"></a>00046                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#28c78081958c5f669277420782f33d4e">km_mat4_stack_initialize</a>(modelview_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00047"></a>00047 
<a name="l00048"></a>00048                 projection_matrix_stack = (<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>*) malloc(<span class="keyword">sizeof</span>(<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>));
<a name="l00049"></a>00049                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#28c78081958c5f669277420782f33d4e">km_mat4_stack_initialize</a>(projection_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00050"></a>00050 
<a name="l00051"></a>00051                 texture_matrix_stack = (<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>*) malloc(<span class="keyword">sizeof</span>(<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html">km_mat4_stack</a>));
<a name="l00052"></a>00052                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#28c78081958c5f669277420782f33d4e">km_mat4_stack_initialize</a>(texture_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00053"></a>00053 
<a name="l00054"></a>00054                 current_stack = modelview_matrix_stack;
<a name="l00055"></a>00055                 initialized = 1;
<a name="l00056"></a>00056 
<a name="l00057"></a>00057                 <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a> identity; <span class="comment">//Temporary identity matrix</span>
<a name="l00058"></a>00058                 <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#11583060bab242acd640d11bbf938a86">kmMat4Identity</a>(&amp;identity);
<a name="l00059"></a>00059 
<a name="l00060"></a>00060                 <span class="comment">//Make sure that each stack has the identity matrix</span>
<a name="l00061"></a>00061                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#05d52e68a5b0f99c5db5cdb20df650a3">km_mat4_stack_push</a>(modelview_matrix_stack, &amp;identity);
<a name="l00062"></a>00062                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#05d52e68a5b0f99c5db5cdb20df650a3">km_mat4_stack_push</a>(projection_matrix_stack, &amp;identity);
<a name="l00063"></a>00063                 <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#05d52e68a5b0f99c5db5cdb20df650a3">km_mat4_stack_push</a>(texture_matrix_stack, &amp;identity);
<a name="l00064"></a>00064         }
<a name="l00065"></a>00065 }
<a name="l00066"></a>00066 
<a name="l00067"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#cc07f172084ef11c02b00c0723f59933">00067</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#cc07f172084ef11c02b00c0723f59933">kmGLMatrixMode</a>(<a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#b9c6ec8f9c3035c828ce9f38b5f41c42">kmGLEnum</a> mode)
<a name="l00068"></a>00068 {
<a name="l00069"></a>00069         <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>();
<a name="l00070"></a>00070 
<a name="l00071"></a>00071         <span class="keywordflow">switch</span>(mode)
<a name="l00072"></a>00072         {
<a name="l00073"></a>00073                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#073bd92d0ad70daa311fcce893065764">KM_GL_MODELVIEW</a>:
<a name="l00074"></a>00074                         current_stack = modelview_matrix_stack;
<a name="l00075"></a>00075                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00076"></a>00076                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#0a3e1bc30cd17fad3d315e2c9c1c3f1f">KM_GL_PROJECTION</a>:
<a name="l00077"></a>00077                         current_stack = projection_matrix_stack;
<a name="l00078"></a>00078                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00079"></a>00079                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#577436e5cbb3657d4e0ab3ee6d2eaf4f">KM_GL_TEXTURE</a>:
<a name="l00080"></a>00080                         current_stack = texture_matrix_stack;
<a name="l00081"></a>00081                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00082"></a>00082                 <span class="keywordflow">default</span>:
<a name="l00083"></a>00083                         assert(0 &amp;&amp; <span class="stringliteral">"Invalid matrix mode specified"</span>); <span class="comment">//TODO: Proper error handling</span>
<a name="l00084"></a>00084                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00085"></a>00085         }
<a name="l00086"></a>00086 }
<a name="l00087"></a>00087 
<a name="l00088"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#eb340bd8568b3e1e81968d5e98e8660f">00088</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#eb340bd8568b3e1e81968d5e98e8660f">kmGLPushMatrix</a>(<span class="keywordtype">void</span>)
<a name="l00089"></a>00089 {
<a name="l00090"></a>00090         <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>(); <span class="comment">//Initialize the stacks if they haven't been already</span>
<a name="l00091"></a>00091 
<a name="l00092"></a>00092         <span class="comment">//Duplicate the top of the stack (i.e the current matrix)</span>
<a name="l00093"></a>00093         <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#05d52e68a5b0f99c5db5cdb20df650a3">km_mat4_stack_push</a>(current_stack, current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00094"></a>00094 }
<a name="l00095"></a>00095 
<a name="l00096"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#72513f0c36911034fbde99337d02f9c3">00096</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#72513f0c36911034fbde99337d02f9c3">kmGLPopMatrix</a>(<span class="keywordtype">void</span>)
<a name="l00097"></a>00097 {
<a name="l00098"></a>00098         <span class="comment">//No need to lazy initialize, you shouldnt be popping first anyway!</span>
<a name="l00099"></a>00099         <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#8d7c8e5b9b183aa81111b2fe51b2a545">km_mat4_stack_pop</a>(current_stack, NULL);
<a name="l00100"></a>00100 }
<a name="l00101"></a>00101 
<a name="l00102"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#df47c2bd7149dc6326b4c15c29bd047d">00102</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#f7b1b51e9e12db6b0bdf0b087641b5cd">kmGLLoadIdentity</a>()
<a name="l00103"></a>00103 {
<a name="l00104"></a>00104         <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>();
<a name="l00105"></a>00105 
<a name="l00106"></a>00106         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#11583060bab242acd640d11bbf938a86">kmMat4Identity</a>(current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>); <span class="comment">//Replace the top matrix with the identity matrix</span>
<a name="l00107"></a>00107 }
<a name="l00108"></a>00108 
<a name="l00109"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#75e7e6cc5dd7445db1ac4747a41ec0f4">00109</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#75e7e6cc5dd7445db1ac4747a41ec0f4">kmGLFreeAll</a>()
<a name="l00110"></a>00110 {
<a name="l00111"></a>00111         <span class="comment">//Clear the matrix stacks</span>
<a name="l00112"></a>00112         <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#c4bac745dfa4c1cc379992ed4ed83683">km_mat4_stack_release</a>(modelview_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00113"></a>00113         <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#c4bac745dfa4c1cc379992ed4ed83683">km_mat4_stack_release</a>(projection_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00114"></a>00114         <a class="code" href="mat4stack_8c.html#c4bac745dfa4c1cc379992ed4ed83683">km_mat4_stack_release</a>(texture_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00115"></a>00115 
<a name="l00116"></a>00116         <span class="comment">//Delete the matrices</span>
<a name="l00117"></a>00117         free(modelview_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00118"></a>00118         free(projection_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00119"></a>00119         free(texture_matrix_stack);
<a name="l00120"></a>00120 
<a name="l00121"></a>00121         initialized = 0; <span class="comment">//Set to uninitialized</span>
<a name="l00122"></a>00122 
<a name="l00123"></a>00123         current_stack = NULL; <span class="comment">//Set the current stack to point nowhere</span>
<a name="l00124"></a>00124 }
<a name="l00125"></a>00125 
<a name="l00126"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#38c1ac69d5c71294f033cb057f9c00ab">00126</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#38c1ac69d5c71294f033cb057f9c00ab">kmGLMultMatrix</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00127"></a>00127 {
<a name="l00128"></a>00128         <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>();
<a name="l00129"></a>00129         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#ccec37cb6ca94ceb1197e3119d4f780c">kmMat4Multiply</a>(current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>, pIn, current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00130"></a>00130 }
<a name="l00131"></a>00131 
<a name="l00132"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#5745f3fc0d9e2abb10275750d7f5fa88">00132</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#5745f3fc0d9e2abb10275750d7f5fa88">kmGLGetMatrix</a>(<a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#b9c6ec8f9c3035c828ce9f38b5f41c42">kmGLEnum</a> mode, <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pOut)
<a name="l00133"></a>00133 {
<a name="l00134"></a>00134         <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#88150226104da75a6527e87603b3ee42">lazyInitialize</a>();
<a name="l00135"></a>00135 
<a name="l00136"></a>00136         <span class="keywordflow">switch</span>(mode)
<a name="l00137"></a>00137         {
<a name="l00138"></a>00138                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#073bd92d0ad70daa311fcce893065764">KM_GL_MODELVIEW</a>:
<a name="l00139"></a>00139                         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#85d5c9784d8b0b17dd9f3d9f708fc6d2">kmMat4Assign</a>(pOut, modelview_matrix_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00140"></a>00140                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00141"></a>00141                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#0a3e1bc30cd17fad3d315e2c9c1c3f1f">KM_GL_PROJECTION</a>:
<a name="l00142"></a>00142                         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#85d5c9784d8b0b17dd9f3d9f708fc6d2">kmMat4Assign</a>(pOut, projection_matrix_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00143"></a>00143                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00144"></a>00144                 <span class="keywordflow">case</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#577436e5cbb3657d4e0ab3ee6d2eaf4f">KM_GL_TEXTURE</a>:
<a name="l00145"></a>00145                         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#85d5c9784d8b0b17dd9f3d9f708fc6d2">kmMat4Assign</a>(pOut, texture_matrix_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00146"></a>00146                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00147"></a>00147                 <span class="keywordflow">default</span>:
<a name="l00148"></a>00148                         assert(1 &amp;&amp; <span class="stringliteral">"Invalid matrix mode specified"</span>); <span class="comment">//TODO: Proper error handling</span>
<a name="l00149"></a>00149                 <span class="keywordflow">break</span>;
<a name="l00150"></a>00150         }
<a name="l00151"></a>00151 }
<a name="l00152"></a>00152 
<a name="l00153"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#7bbc4546bcdc05b410b8bf0dea11a6d3">00153</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#7bbc4546bcdc05b410b8bf0dea11a6d3">kmGLTranslatef</a>(<span class="keywordtype">float</span> x, <span class="keywordtype">float</span> y, <span class="keywordtype">float</span> z)
<a name="l00154"></a>00154 {
<a name="l00155"></a>00155         current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[12] += x;
<a name="l00156"></a>00156         current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[13] += y;
<a name="l00157"></a>00157         current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[14] += z;
<a name="l00158"></a>00158 }
<a name="l00159"></a>00159 
<a name="l00160"></a><a class="code" href="matrix_8h.html#9c0db65b3bd6c6e99e3419cd76488938">00160</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="matrix_8c.html#9c0db65b3bd6c6e99e3419cd76488938">kmGLRotatef</a>(<span class="keywordtype">float</span> angle, <span class="keywordtype">float</span> x, <span class="keywordtype">float</span> y, <span class="keywordtype">float</span> z)
<a name="l00161"></a>00161 {

<a name="l00164"></a>00164

<a name="l00166"></a>00166         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#327a16c25be8c921f5c8710e14c4fdcd">kmVec3Fill</a>(&amp;axis, x, y, z);
<a name="l00167"></a>00167 
<a name="l00168"></a>00168         <span class="comment">//Create a rotation matrix using the axis and the angle</span>
<a name="l00169"></a>00169         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#ee198989b4b4dd5ecc4e0aa66804be23">kmMat4RotationAxis</a>(&amp;rotation, &amp;axis, <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34">kmDegreesToRadians</a>(angle));
<a name="l00170"></a>00170 
<a name="l00171"></a>00171         <span class="comment">//Multiply the rotation matrix by the current matrix</span>
<a name="l00172"></a>00172         <a class="code" href="mat4_8c.html#ccec37cb6ca94ceb1197e3119d4f780c">kmMat4Multiply</a>(current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>, &amp;rotation, current_stack-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm__mat4__stack.html#487ba8aa0a0176eb21899bd8bc38f153">top</a>);
<a name="l00173"></a>00173 }
<a name="l00174"></a>00174

          <td class="paramkey"></td>
          <td></td>

          <td>)</td>
          <td></td><td></td><td></td>

      </table>

<a name="l00026"></a>00026 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;assert.h&gt;</span>
<a name="l00027"></a>00027 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;stdlib.h&gt;</span>
<a name="l00028"></a>00028 
<a name="l00029"></a>00029 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html">vec3.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00030"></a>00030 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html">vec4.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00031"></a>00031 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="plane_8h.html">plane.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00032"></a>00032 
<a name="l00033"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#b629d1aed271758fea6b66a3f821af9b">00033</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#b629d1aed271758fea6b66a3f821af9b">kmPlaneDot</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV)
<a name="l00034"></a>00034 {
<a name="l00035"></a>00035         <span class="comment">//a*x + b*y + c*z + d*w</span>
<a name="l00036"></a>00036 
<a name="l00037"></a>00037         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> +
<a name="l00038"></a>00038                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> +
<a name="l00039"></a>00039                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> +
<a name="l00040"></a>00040                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a>);
<a name="l00041"></a>00041 }
<a name="l00042"></a>00042 
<a name="l00043"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#7f41b74051b63bbdb78677157bb49768">00043</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#7f41b74051b63bbdb78677157bb49768">kmPlaneDotCoord</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV)
<a name="l00044"></a>00044 {
<a name="l00045"></a>00045         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> +
<a name="l00046"></a>00046                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> +
<a name="l00047"></a>00047                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> + pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a>);
<a name="l00048"></a>00048 }
<a name="l00049"></a>00049 
<a name="l00050"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#e49f1d41f9a2628ccd0f833186b6d018">00050</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#e49f1d41f9a2628ccd0f833186b6d018">kmPlaneDotNormal</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV)
<a name="l00051"></a>00051 {
<a name="l00052"></a>00052         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> +
<a name="l00053"></a>00053                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> +
<a name="l00054"></a>00054                         pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> * pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>);
<a name="l00055"></a>00055 }
<a name="l00056"></a>00056 
<a name="l00057"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#1c59e3629db4ad7a74852a15adabba75">00057</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#1c59e3629db4ad7a74852a15adabba75">kmPlaneFromPointNormal</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pPoint, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pNormal)
<a name="l00058"></a>00058 {
<a name="l00059"></a>00059         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00060"></a>00060 <span class="comment">                Planea = Nx</span>
<a name="l00061"></a>00061 <span class="comment">                Planeb = Ny</span>
<a name="l00062"></a>00062 <span class="comment">                Planec = Nz</span>
<a name="l00063"></a>00063 <span class="comment">                Planed = −N⋅P</span>
<a name="l00064"></a>00064 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00065"></a>00065 
<a name="l00066"></a>00066 
<a name="l00067"></a>00067         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> = pNormal-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00068"></a>00068         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> = pNormal-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00069"></a>00069         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> = pNormal-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00070"></a>00070         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a> = -<a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7ed6bea8c65144ef31156825aea0b3e5">kmVec3Dot</a>(pNormal, pPoint);
<a name="l00071"></a>00071 
<a name="l00072"></a>00072         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00073"></a>00073 }
<a name="l00074"></a>00074 
<a name="l00079"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#4e556e69a5bfa69c78f10848caa0fd70">00079</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#4e556e69a5bfa69c78f10848caa0fd70">kmPlaneFromPoints</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* p1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* p2, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* p3)
<a name="l00080"></a>00080 {
<a name="l00081"></a>00081         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00082"></a>00082 <span class="comment">        v = (B − A) × (C − A)</span>
<a name="l00083"></a>00083 <span class="comment">        n = 1⁄|v| v</span>
<a name="l00084"></a>00084 <span class="comment">        Outa = nx</span>
<a name="l00085"></a>00085 <span class="comment">        Outb = ny</span>
<a name="l00086"></a>00086 <span class="comment">        Outc = nz</span>
<a name="l00087"></a>00087 <span class="comment">        Outd = −n⋅A</span>
<a name="l00088"></a>00088 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00089"></a>00089 
<a name="l00090"></a>00090         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> n, v1, v2;
<a name="l00091"></a>00091         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#07cb9ab6d64f4a458191f80eb3405324">kmVec3Subtract</a>(&amp;v1, p2, p1); <span class="comment">//Create the vectors for the 2 sides of the triangle</span>
<a name="l00092"></a>00092         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#07cb9ab6d64f4a458191f80eb3405324">kmVec3Subtract</a>(&amp;v2, p3, p1);
<a name="l00093"></a>00093         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;n, &amp;v1, &amp;v2); <span class="comment">//Use the cross product to get the normal</span>
<a name="l00094"></a>00094 
<a name="l00095"></a>00095         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(&amp;n, &amp;n); <span class="comment">//Normalize it and assign to pOut-&gt;m_N</span>
<a name="l00096"></a>00096 
<a name="l00097"></a>00097         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00098"></a>00098         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00099"></a>00099         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00100"></a>00100         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a> = <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7ed6bea8c65144ef31156825aea0b3e5">kmVec3Dot</a>(<a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#340a910a28c1b7bec6c55fb7072e331f">kmVec3Scale</a>(&amp;n, &amp;n, -1.0), p1);
<a name="l00101"></a>00101 
<a name="l00102"></a>00102         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00103"></a>00103 }
<a name="l00104"></a>00104 
<a name="l00105"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#0d1dad6b28f469aa1a62da5bc1388627">00105</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#0d1dad6b28f469aa1a62da5bc1388627">kmPlaneIntersectLine</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00106"></a>00106 {
<a name="l00107"></a>00107         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00108"></a>00108 <span class="comment">                n = (Planea, Planeb, Planec)</span>
<a name="l00109"></a>00109 <span class="comment">                d = V − U</span>
<a name="l00110"></a>00110 <span class="comment">                Out = U − d⋅(Pd + n⋅U)⁄(d⋅n) [iff d⋅n ≠ 0]</span>
<a name="l00111"></a>00111 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00112"></a>00112     <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> d;
<a name="l00113"></a>00113         assert(0 &amp;&amp; <span class="stringliteral">"Not implemented"</span>);
<a name="l00114"></a>00114 
<a name="l00115"></a>00115 
<a name="l00116"></a>00116         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#07cb9ab6d64f4a458191f80eb3405324">kmVec3Subtract</a>(&amp;d, pV2, pV1); <span class="comment">//Get the direction vector</span>
<a name="l00117"></a>00117 
<a name="l00118"></a>00118 
<a name="l00119"></a>00119         <span class="comment">//TODO: Continue here!</span>
<a name="l00120"></a>00120         <span class="comment">/*if (fabs(kmVec3Dot(&amp;pP-&gt;m_N, &amp;d)) &gt; kmEpsilon)</span>
<a name="l00121"></a>00121 <span class="comment">        {</span>
<a name="l00122"></a>00122 <span class="comment">                //If we get here then the plane and line are parallel (i.e. no intersection)</span>
<a name="l00123"></a>00123 <span class="comment">                pOut = nullptr; //Set to nullptr</span>
<a name="l00124"></a>00124 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00125"></a>00125 <span class="comment">                return pOut;</span>
<a name="l00126"></a>00126 <span class="comment">        } */</span>
<a name="l00127"></a>00127 
<a name="l00128"></a>00128     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> NULL;
<a name="l00129"></a>00129 }
<a name="l00130"></a>00130 
<a name="l00131"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#550d82a8899910ba8d58209c308aa59d">00131</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#550d82a8899910ba8d58209c308aa59d">kmPlaneNormalize</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP)
<a name="l00132"></a>00132 {
<a name="l00133"></a>00133         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> n;
<a name="l00134"></a>00134     <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> l = 0;
<a name="l00135"></a>00135 
<a name="l00136"></a>00136         n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a>;
<a name="l00137"></a>00137         n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a>;
<a name="l00138"></a>00138         n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a>;
<a name="l00139"></a>00139 
<a name="l00140"></a>00140         l = 1.0f / <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#8e019f2b3549e0dc7b9847868ba548fa">kmVec3Length</a>(&amp;n); <span class="comment">//Get 1/length</span>
<a name="l00141"></a>00141         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(&amp;n, &amp;n); <span class="comment">//Normalize the vector and assign to pOut</span>
<a name="l00142"></a>00142 
<a name="l00143"></a>00143         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00144"></a>00144         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00145"></a>00145         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> = n.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00146"></a>00146 
<a name="l00147"></a>00147         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a> = pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a> * l; <span class="comment">//Scale the D value and assign to pOut</span>
<a name="l00148"></a>00148 
<a name="l00149"></a>00149         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00150"></a>00150 }
<a name="l00151"></a>00151 
<a name="l00152"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#85beb0fc4846b401cebf6d95114dd871">00152</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#85beb0fc4846b401cebf6d95114dd871">kmPlaneScale</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pP, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s)
<a name="l00153"></a>00153 {
<a name="l00154"></a>00154         assert(0 &amp;&amp; <span class="stringliteral">"Not implemented"</span>);
<a name="l00155"></a>00155     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> NULL;
<a name="l00156"></a>00156 }
<a name="l00157"></a>00157 
<a name="l00162"></a><a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#8a74a1d649bcd7438e83e38d8b1640a0">00162</a> <a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#81a1a7c372b7e9de0d7b70e56c0e59ab">POINT_CLASSIFICATION</a> <a class="code" href="plane_8c.html#8a74a1d649bcd7438e83e38d8b1640a0">kmPlaneClassifyPoint</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a>* pIn, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pP)
<a name="l00163"></a>00163 {
<a name="l00164"></a>00164    <span class="comment">// This function will determine if a point is on, in front of, or behind</span>
<a name="l00165"></a>00165    <span class="comment">// the plane.  First we store the dot product of the plane and the point.</span>
<a name="l00166"></a>00166    <span class="keywordtype">float</span> distance = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#912b0822bfd525570a072d01b0c3b9e1">a</a> * pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#c16b759b0f6973f00c2c742ec418e2d1">b</a> * pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#46fb82aee3e4ccec7bb027ba53998600">c</a> * pP-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_plane.html#a3c74528242125229ab0038e9a09b803">d</a>;
<a name="l00167"></a>00167 
<a name="l00168"></a>00168    <span class="comment">// Simply put if the dot product is greater than 0 then it is infront of it.</span>
<a name="l00169"></a>00169    <span class="comment">// If it is less than 0 then it is behind it.  And if it is 0 then it is on it.</span>
<a name="l00170"></a>00170    <span class="keywordflow">if</span>(distance &gt; 0.001) <span class="keywordflow">return</span> <a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#81a1a7c372b7e9de0d7b70e56c0e59ab672074965b7457560d39872373e3cf34">POINT_INFRONT_OF_PLANE</a>;
<a name="l00171"></a>00171    <span class="keywordflow">if</span>(distance &lt; -0.001) <span class="keywordflow">return</span> <a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#81a1a7c372b7e9de0d7b70e56c0e59abd2d0e166fa9b7426f36abb8120e0acaa">POINT_BEHIND_PLANE</a>;
<a name="l00172"></a>00172 
<a name="l00173"></a>00173    <span class="keywordflow">return</span> <a class="code" href="plane_8h.html#81a1a7c372b7e9de0d7b70e56c0e59ab5673c0312975039ba8547e7e20fcf3e2">POINT_ON_PLANE</a>;
<a name="l00174"></a>00174 }
<a name="l00175"></a>00175 
</pre></div></div>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Returns POINT_INFRONT_OF_PLANE if pP is infront of pIn. Returns POINT_BEHIND_PLANE if it is behind. Returns POINT_ON_PLANE otherwise 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html#l00162">162</a> of file <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html">plane.c</a>.</p>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Creates a plane from 3 points. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned. 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html#l00079">79</a> of file <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html">plane.c</a>.</p>

          <td></td>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Returns POINT_INFRONT_OF_PLANE if pP is infront of pIn. Returns POINT_BEHIND_PLANE if it is behind. Returns POINT_ON_PLANE otherwise 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html#l00162">162</a> of file <a class="el" href="plane_8c-source.html">plane.c</a>.</p>

          <td class="paramtype">const <a class="el" href="structkm_plane.html">kmPlane</a> *&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>pP</em>, </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td class="paramkey"></td>
          <td></td>
          <td class="paramtype">kmScalar&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>s</em></td><td>&nbsp;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>)</td>
          <td></td><td></td><td></td>
        </tr>
      </table>
</div>

<a name="l00027"></a>00027 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;assert.h&gt;</span>
<a name="l00028"></a>00028 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;memory.h&gt;</span>

<a name="l00031"></a>00031 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="mat4_8h.html">mat4.h</a>"</span>
