<a name="l00033"></a>00033 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html">quaternion.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00034"></a>00034 
<a name="l00036"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#e78e9a0ff172448f7741780b7d86a225">00036</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#e78e9a0ff172448f7741780b7d86a225" title="&amp;lt; Returns pOut, sets pOut to the conjugate of pIn">kmQuaternionConjugate</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00037"></a>00037 {
<a name="l00038"></a>00038         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = -pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a>;
<a name="l00039"></a>00039         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = -pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a>;
<a name="l00040"></a>00040         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = -pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>;
<a name="l00041"></a>00041         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a>;
<a name="l00042"></a>00042 
<a name="l00043"></a>00043         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00044"></a>00044 }
<a name="l00045"></a>00045 
<a name="l00047"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#bd206c6c13d8472033b650b30adadaeb">00047</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#bd206c6c13d8472033b650b30adadaeb" title="Returns the exponential of the quaternion.">kmQuaternionDot</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q2)
<a name="l00048"></a>00048 {
<a name="l00049"></a>00049         <span class="comment">// A dot B = B dot A = AtBt + AxBx + AyBy + AzBz</span>
<a name="l00050"></a>00050 
<a name="l00051"></a>00051         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> +
<a name="l00052"></a>00052                         q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> +
<a name="l00053"></a>00053                         q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> +
<a name="l00054"></a>00054                         q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>);
<a name="l00055"></a>00055 }
<a name="l00056"></a>00056 
<a name="l00058"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#f489c3ed88f9211f1d8ca9ad9070c56c">00058</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#f489c3ed88f9211f1d8ca9ad9070c56c" title="Makes the passed quaternion an identity quaternion.">kmQuaternionExp</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00059"></a>00059 {
<a name="l00060"></a>00060         assert(0);
<a name="l00061"></a>00061 
<a name="l00062"></a>00062         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00063"></a>00063 }
<a name="l00064"></a>00064 
<a name="l00066"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#565c225c463f346c3d517fe06e63e907">00066</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#565c225c463f346c3d517fe06e63e907" title="Returns the inverse of the passed Quaternion.">kmQuaternionIdentity</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut)
<a name="l00067"></a>00067 {
<a name="l00068"></a>00068         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00069"></a>00069         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00070"></a>00070         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00071"></a>00071         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = 1.0;
<a name="l00072"></a>00072 
<a name="l00073"></a>00073         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00074"></a>00074 }
<a name="l00075"></a>00075 
<a name="l00077"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#ed5991d7df5eab0d07d7ee985d8f1d42">00077</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#ed5991d7df5eab0d07d7ee985d8f1d42" title="Returns true if the quaternion is an identity quaternion.">kmQuaternionInverse</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00078"></a>00078                                                                                         <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00079"></a>00079 {
<a name="l00080"></a>00080         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> l = <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#7673b42058825feab58d42c5b81b28ea" title="Returns the length of the quaternion squared (prevents a sqrt).">kmQuaternionLength</a>(pIn);
<a name="l00081"></a>00081     <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a> tmp;
<a name="l00082"></a>00082 
<a name="l00083"></a>00083         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (fabs(l) &gt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)
<a name="l00084"></a>00084         {
<a name="l00085"></a>00085                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00086"></a>00086                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00087"></a>00087                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00088"></a>00088                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00089"></a>00089 
<a name="l00090"></a>00090                 <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00091"></a>00091         }
<a name="l00092"></a>00092 
<a name="l00093"></a>00093 
<a name="l00094"></a>00094 
<a name="l00096"></a>00096         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">kmQuaternionScale</a>(pOut,
<a name="l00097"></a>00097                                 <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#e78e9a0ff172448f7741780b7d86a225" title="&amp;lt; Returns pOut, sets pOut to the conjugate of pIn">kmQuaternionConjugate</a>(&amp;tmp, pIn), 1.0f / l);
<a name="l00098"></a>00098 
<a name="l00099"></a>00099         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00100"></a>00100 }
<a name="l00101"></a>00101 
<a name="l00103"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#af0b1ad157c15f7ee378e983d4a37b39">00103</a> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#af0b1ad157c15f7ee378e983d4a37b39" title="Returns the length of the quaternion.">kmQuaternionIsIdentity</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00104"></a>00104 {
<a name="l00105"></a>00105         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> == 0.0 &amp;&amp; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> == 0.0 &amp;&amp; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> == 0.0 &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00106"></a>00106                                 pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> == 1.0);
<a name="l00107"></a>00107 }
<a name="l00108"></a>00108 
<a name="l00110"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#7673b42058825feab58d42c5b81b28ea">00110</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#7673b42058825feab58d42c5b81b28ea" title="Returns the length of the quaternion squared (prevents a sqrt).">kmQuaternionLength</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00111"></a>00111 {
<a name="l00112"></a>00112         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> sqrtf(<a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a84d8ea58015f783ce9a579e5c22d993" title="Returns the natural logarithm.">kmQuaternionLengthSq</a>(pIn));
<a name="l00113"></a>00113 }
<a name="l00114"></a>00114 
<a name="l00116"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#a84d8ea58015f783ce9a579e5c22d993">00116</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a84d8ea58015f783ce9a579e5c22d993" title="Returns the natural logarithm.">kmQuaternionLengthSq</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00117"></a>00117 {
<a name="l00118"></a>00118         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> +
<a name="l00119"></a>00119                                                 pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a>;
<a name="l00120"></a>00120 }
<a name="l00121"></a>00121 
<a name="l00123"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#f19bf21818994470e5dfaa7566d26bfb">00123</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#f19bf21818994470e5dfaa7566d26bfb" title="Multiplies 2 quaternions together.">kmQuaternionLn</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00124"></a>00124                                                                                 <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00125"></a>00125 {
<a name="l00126"></a>00126         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00127"></a>00127 <span class="comment">                A unit quaternion, is defined by:</span>
<a name="l00128"></a>00128 <span class="comment">                Q == (cos(theta), sin(theta) * v) where |v| = 1</span>
<a name="l00129"></a>00129 <span class="comment">                The natural logarithm of Q is, ln(Q) = (0, theta * v)</span>
<a name="l00130"></a>00130 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00131"></a>00131 
<a name="l00132"></a>00132         assert(0);
<a name="l00133"></a>00133 
<a name="l00134"></a>00134         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00135"></a>00135 }
<a name="l00136"></a>00136 
<a name="l00138"></a>00138 <span class="keyword">extern</span>
<a name="l00139"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#93465ed146ea4b0b85c76d5aa90b40fc">00139</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#93465ed146ea4b0b85c76d5aa90b40fc" title="Normalizes a quaternion.">kmQuaternionMultiply</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00140"></a>00140                                                                  <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q1,
<a name="l00141"></a>00141                                                                  <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q2)
<a name="l00142"></a>00142 {
<a name="l00143"></a>00143         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>;
<a name="l00144"></a>00144         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a>;
<a name="l00145"></a>00145         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>;
<a name="l00146"></a>00146         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> + q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> - q1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * q2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a>;
<a name="l00147"></a>00147 
<a name="l00148"></a>00148         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00149"></a>00149 }
<a name="l00150"></a>00150 
<a name="l00152"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72">00152</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72" title="Rotates a quaternion around an axis.">kmQuaternionNormalize</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00153"></a>00153                                                                                         <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00154"></a>00154 {
<a name="l00155"></a>00155         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> length = <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#7673b42058825feab58d42c5b81b28ea" title="Returns the length of the quaternion squared (prevents a sqrt).">kmQuaternionLength</a>(pIn);
<a name="l00156"></a>00156         assert(fabs(length) &gt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>);
<a name="l00157"></a>00157         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">kmQuaternionScale</a>(pOut, pIn, 1.0f / length);
<a name="l00158"></a>00158 
<a name="l00159"></a>00159         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00160"></a>00160 }
<a name="l00161"></a>00161 
<a name="l00163"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#c7d1fb61003bc4f8c585ddeb8952d0da">00163</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#c7d1fb61003bc4f8c585ddeb8952d0da" title="Creates a quaternion from a rotation matrix.">kmQuaternionRotationAxis</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00164"></a>00164                                                                         <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV,
<a name="l00165"></a>00165                                                                         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> angle)
<a name="l00166"></a>00166 {
<a name="l00167"></a>00167         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> rad = angle * 0.5f;
<a name="l00168"></a>00168         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> scale  = sinf(rad);
<a name="l00169"></a>00169 
<a name="l00170"></a>00170         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = cosf(rad);
<a name="l00171"></a>00171         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * scale;
<a name="l00172"></a>00172         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * scale;
<a name="l00173"></a>00173         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * scale;
<a name="l00174"></a>00174 
<a name="l00175"></a>00175         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00176"></a>00176 }
<a name="l00177"></a>00177 
<a name="l00179"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#4caf1215194c03f4812752077a7f591b">00179</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#4caf1215194c03f4812752077a7f591b" title="Create a quaternion from yaw, pitch and roll.">kmQuaternionRotationMatrix</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00180"></a>00180                                                                                 <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00181"></a>00181 {
<a name="l00182"></a>00182 <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00183"></a>00183 <span class="comment">Note: The OpenGL matrices are transposed from the description below</span>
<a name="l00184"></a>00184 <span class="comment">taken from the Matrix and Quaternion FAQ</span>
<a name="l00185"></a>00185 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00186"></a>00186 <span class="comment">    if ( mat[0] &gt; mat[5] &amp;&amp; mat[0] &gt; mat[10] )  {       // Column 0:</span>
<a name="l00187"></a>00187 <span class="comment">        S  = sqrt( 1.0 + mat[0] - mat[5] - mat[10] ) * 2;</span>
<a name="l00188"></a>00188 <span class="comment">        X = 0.25 * S;</span>
<a name="l00189"></a>00189 <span class="comment">        Y = (mat[4] + mat[1] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00190"></a>00190 <span class="comment">        Z = (mat[2] + mat[8] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00191"></a>00191 <span class="comment">        W = (mat[9] - mat[6] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00192"></a>00192 <span class="comment">    } else if ( mat[5] &gt; mat[10] ) {                    // Column 1:</span>
<a name="l00193"></a>00193 <span class="comment">        S  = sqrt( 1.0 + mat[5] - mat[0] - mat[10] ) * 2;</span>
<a name="l00194"></a>00194 <span class="comment">        X = (mat[4] + mat[1] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00195"></a>00195 <span class="comment">        Y = 0.25 * S;</span>
<a name="l00196"></a>00196 <span class="comment">        Z = (mat[9] + mat[6] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00197"></a>00197 <span class="comment">        W = (mat[2] - mat[8] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00198"></a>00198 <span class="comment">    } else {                                            // Column 2:</span>
<a name="l00199"></a>00199 <span class="comment">        S  = sqrt( 1.0 + mat[10] - mat[0] - mat[5] ) * 2;</span>
<a name="l00200"></a>00200 <span class="comment">        X = (mat[2] + mat[8] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00201"></a>00201 <span class="comment">        Y = (mat[9] + mat[6] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00202"></a>00202 <span class="comment">        Z = 0.25 * S;</span>
<a name="l00203"></a>00203 <span class="comment">        W = (mat[4] - mat[1] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00204"></a>00204 <span class="comment">    }</span>
<a name="l00205"></a>00205 <span class="comment">*/</span>
<a name="l00206"></a>00206 
<a name="l00207"></a>00207         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> T = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10];
<a name="l00208"></a>00208 
<a name="l00209"></a>00209         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (T &gt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) {
<a name="l00210"></a>00210                 <span class="comment">//If the trace is greater than zero we always use this calculation:</span>
<a name="l00211"></a>00211                 <span class="comment">/*  S = sqrt(T) * 2;</span>
<a name="l00212"></a>00212 <span class="comment">                  X = ( mat[9] - mat[6] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00213"></a>00213 <span class="comment">                  Y = ( mat[2] - mat[8] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00214"></a>00214 <span class="comment">                  Z = ( mat[4] - mat[1] ) / S;</span>
<a name="l00215"></a>00215 <span class="comment">                  W = 0.25 * S;*/</span>
<a name="l00216"></a>00216 
<a name="l00217"></a>00217                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s = sqrtf(T) * 2;
<a name="l00218"></a>00218                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6]) / s;
<a name="l00219"></a>00219                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2]) / s;
<a name="l00220"></a>00220                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4]) / s;
<a name="l00221"></a>00221                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = 0.25f * s;
<a name="l00222"></a>00222 
<a name="l00223"></a>00223                 <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72" title="Rotates a quaternion around an axis.">kmQuaternionNormalize</a>(pOut, pOut);
<a name="l00224"></a>00224                 <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00225"></a>00225         }
<a name="l00226"></a>00226 
<a name="l00227"></a>00227         <span class="comment">//Otherwise the calculation depends on which major diagonal element has the greatest value.</span>
<a name="l00228"></a>00228 
<a name="l00229"></a>00229         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] &gt; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] &amp;&amp; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] &gt; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10]) {
<a name="l00230"></a>00230                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s = sqrtf(1 + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10]) * 2;
<a name="l00231"></a>00231                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = 0.25f * s;
<a name="l00232"></a>00232                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4]) / s;
<a name="l00233"></a>00233                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2]) / s;
<a name="l00234"></a>00234                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6]) / s;
<a name="l00235"></a>00235         }
<a name="l00236"></a>00236         <span class="keywordflow">else</span> <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] &gt; pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10]) {
<a name="l00237"></a>00237                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s = sqrtf(1 + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10]) * 2;
<a name="l00238"></a>00238                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4]) / s;
<a name="l00239"></a>00239                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = 0.25f * s;
<a name="l00240"></a>00240                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6]) / s;
<a name="l00241"></a>00241                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2]) / s;
<a name="l00242"></a>00242         }
<a name="l00243"></a>00243         <span class="keywordflow">else</span> {
<a name="l00244"></a>00244                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s = sqrt(1.0f + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5]) * 2.0f;
<a name="l00245"></a>00245         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2] ) / s;
<a name="l00246"></a>00246         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6] + pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] ) / s;
<a name="l00247"></a>00247         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = 0.25f * s;
<a name="l00248"></a>00248         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = (pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] - pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] ) / s;
<a name="l00249"></a>00249         }
<a name="l00250"></a>00250 
<a name="l00251"></a>00251         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72" title="Rotates a quaternion around an axis.">kmQuaternionNormalize</a>(pOut, pOut);
<a name="l00252"></a>00252         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00253"></a>00253 }
<a name="l00254"></a>00254 
<a name="l00256"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#c1014369455cdb61094663d008c8be99">00256</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#c1014369455cdb61094663d008c8be99" title="Interpolate between 2 quaternions.">kmQuaternionRotationYawPitchRoll</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00257"></a>00257                                                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> yaw,
<a name="l00258"></a>00258                                                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> pitch,
<a name="l00259"></a>00259                                                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> roll)
<a name="l00260"></a>00260 {
<a name="l00261"></a>00261         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a>        ex, ey, ez;             <span class="comment">// temp half euler angles</span>
<a name="l00262"></a>00262         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a>        cr, cp, cy, sr, sp, sy, cpcy, spsy;             <span class="comment">// temp vars in roll,pitch yaw</span>
<a name="l00263"></a>00263 
<a name="l00264"></a>00264         ex = <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34">kmDegreesToRadians</a>(pitch) / 2.0f;  <span class="comment">// convert to rads and half them</span>
<a name="l00265"></a>00265         ey = <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34">kmDegreesToRadians</a>(yaw) / 2.0f;
<a name="l00266"></a>00266         ez = <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34">kmDegreesToRadians</a>(roll) / 2.0f;
<a name="l00267"></a>00267 
<a name="l00268"></a>00268         cr = cosf(ex);
<a name="l00269"></a>00269         cp = cosf(ey);
<a name="l00270"></a>00270         cy = cosf(ez);
<a name="l00271"></a>00271 
<a name="l00272"></a>00272         sr = sinf(ex);
<a name="l00273"></a>00273         sp = sinf(ey);
<a name="l00274"></a>00274         sy = sinf(ez);
<a name="l00275"></a>00275 
<a name="l00276"></a>00276         cpcy = cp * cy;
<a name="l00277"></a>00277         spsy = sp * sy;
<a name="l00278"></a>00278 
<a name="l00279"></a>00279         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = cr * cpcy + sr * spsy;
<a name="l00280"></a>00280 
<a name="l00281"></a>00281         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = sr * cpcy - cr * spsy;
<a name="l00282"></a>00282         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = cr * sp * cy + sr * cp * sy;
<a name="l00283"></a>00283         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = cr * cp * sy - sr * sp * cy;
<a name="l00284"></a>00284 
<a name="l00285"></a>00285         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72" title="Rotates a quaternion around an axis.">kmQuaternionNormalize</a>(pOut, pOut);
<a name="l00286"></a>00286 
<a name="l00287"></a>00287         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00288"></a>00288 }
<a name="l00289"></a>00289 
<a name="l00291"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#825686e87bea008697312027d5e73a53">00291</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#825686e87bea008697312027d5e73a53" title="Get the axis and angle of rotation from a quaternion.">kmQuaternionSlerp</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00292"></a>00292                                                                 <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q1,
<a name="l00293"></a>00293                                                                 <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q2,
<a name="l00294"></a>00294                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> t)
<a name="l00295"></a>00295 {
<a name="l00296"></a>00296 
<a name="l00297"></a>00297  <span class="comment">/*float CosTheta = Q0.DotProd(Q1);</span>
<a name="l00298"></a>00298 <span class="comment">  float Theta = acosf(CosTheta);</span>
<a name="l00299"></a>00299 <span class="comment">  float SinTheta = sqrtf(1.0f-CosTheta*CosTheta);</span>
<a name="l00300"></a>00300 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00301"></a>00301 <span class="comment">  float Sin_T_Theta = sinf(T*Theta)/SinTheta;</span>
<a name="l00302"></a>00302 <span class="comment">  float Sin_OneMinusT_Theta = sinf((1.0f-T)*Theta)/SinTheta;</span>
<a name="l00303"></a>00303 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00304"></a>00304 <span class="comment">  Quaternion Result = Q0*Sin_OneMinusT_Theta;</span>
<a name="l00305"></a>00305 <span class="comment">  Result += (Q1*Sin_T_Theta);</span>
<a name="l00306"></a>00306 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00307"></a>00307 <span class="comment">  return Result;*/</span>
<a name="l00308"></a>00308 
<a name="l00309"></a>00309         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> ct = <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#bd206c6c13d8472033b650b30adadaeb" title="Returns the exponential of the quaternion.">kmQuaternionDot</a>(q1, q2);
<a name="l00310"></a>00310         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> theta = acosf(ct);
<a name="l00311"></a>00311         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> st = sqrtf(1.0 - <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(ct));
<a name="l00312"></a>00312 
<a name="l00313"></a>00313         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> stt = sinf(t * theta) / st;
<a name="l00314"></a>00314         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> somt = sinf((1.0 - t) * theta) / st;
<a name="l00315"></a>00315 
<a name="l00316"></a>00316         <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a> temp, temp2;
<a name="l00317"></a>00317         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">kmQuaternionScale</a>(&amp;temp, q1, somt);
<a name="l00318"></a>00318         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">kmQuaternionScale</a>(&amp;temp2, q2, stt);
<a name="l00319"></a>00319         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#1756e7c5833651a475b8bb8bf894b7b9">kmQuaternionAdd</a>(pOut, &amp;temp, &amp;temp2);
<a name="l00320"></a>00320 
<a name="l00321"></a>00321         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00322"></a>00322 }
<a name="l00323"></a>00323 
<a name="l00325"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#3c5ee88f6345003c15750fac1a60c483">00325</a> <span class="keywordtype">void</span> <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a0c641b9b92b820459d0e83288ea82c9" title="Scale a quaternion.">kmQuaternionToAxisAngle</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn,
<a name="l00326"></a>00326                                                                 <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pAxis,
<a name="l00327"></a>00327                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a>* pAngle)
<a name="l00328"></a>00328 {
<a name="l00329"></a>00329         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a>        tempAngle;              <span class="comment">// temp angle</span>
<a name="l00330"></a>00330         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a>        scale;                  <span class="comment">// temp vars</span>
<a name="l00331"></a>00331 
<a name="l00332"></a>00332         tempAngle = acosf(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a>);
<a name="l00333"></a>00333         scale = sqrtf(<a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>));
<a name="l00334"></a>00334 
<a name="l00335"></a>00335         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (((scale &gt; -<a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp; scale &lt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)
<a name="l00336"></a>00336                 || (scale &lt; 360.0f + kmEpsilon &amp;&amp; scale &gt; 360.0f - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>))          <span class="comment">// angle is 0 or 360 so just simply set axis to 0,0,1 with angle 0</span>
<a name="l00337"></a>00337         {
<a name="l00338"></a>00338                 *pAngle = 0.0f;
<a name="l00339"></a>00339 
<a name="l00340"></a>00340                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = 0.0f;
<a name="l00341"></a>00341                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = 0.0f;
<a name="l00342"></a>00342                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = 1.0f;
<a name="l00343"></a>00343         }
<a name="l00344"></a>00344         <span class="keywordflow">else</span>
<a name="l00345"></a>00345         {
<a name="l00346"></a>00346                 *pAngle = tempAngle * 2.0f;             <span class="comment">// angle in radians</span>
<a name="l00347"></a>00347 
<a name="l00348"></a>00348                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> / scale;
<a name="l00349"></a>00349                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> / scale;
<a name="l00350"></a>00350                 pAxis-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> / scale;
<a name="l00351"></a>00351                 <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(pAxis, pAxis);
<a name="l00352"></a>00352         }
<a name="l00353"></a>00353 }
<a name="l00354"></a>00354 
<a name="l00355"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">00355</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#a73b630b1bd545f17f07ec1eedc60915">kmQuaternionScale</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut,
<a name="l00356"></a>00356                                                                                 <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn,
<a name="l00357"></a>00357                                                                                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s)
<a name="l00358"></a>00358 {
<a name="l00359"></a>00359         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> * s;
<a name="l00360"></a>00360         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> * s;
<a name="l00361"></a>00361         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> * s;
<a name="l00362"></a>00362         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> * s;
<a name="l00363"></a>00363 
<a name="l00364"></a>00364         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00365"></a>00365 }
<a name="l00366"></a>00366 
<a name="l00367"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#40bfde3efcb54ae3927cd9cc66dc4cb7">00367</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#40bfde3efcb54ae3927cd9cc66dc4cb7">kmQuaternionAssign</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00368"></a>00368 {
<a name="l00369"></a>00369         memcpy(pOut, pIn, <span class="keyword">sizeof</span>(<span class="keywordtype">float</span>) * 4);
<a name="l00370"></a>00370 
<a name="l00371"></a>00371         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00372"></a>00372 }
<a name="l00373"></a>00373 
<a name="l00374"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#1756e7c5833651a475b8bb8bf894b7b9">00374</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#1756e7c5833651a475b8bb8bf894b7b9">kmQuaternionAdd</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pQ1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pQ2)
<a name="l00375"></a>00375 {
<a name="l00376"></a>00376         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = pQ1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> + pQ2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a>;
<a name="l00377"></a>00377         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = pQ1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> + pQ2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a>;
<a name="l00378"></a>00378         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = pQ1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> + pQ2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>;
<a name="l00379"></a>00379         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = pQ1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> + pQ2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a>;
<a name="l00380"></a>00380 
<a name="l00381"></a>00381         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00382"></a>00382 }
<a name="l00383"></a>00383 
<a name="l00395"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#ca700f8ae35c3ad7e812e4dd57848849">00395</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#ca700f8ae35c3ad7e812e4dd57848849">kmQuaternionRotationBetweenVec3</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* vec1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* vec2, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* fallback) {
<a name="l00396"></a>00396 
<a name="l00397"></a>00397         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v1, v2;
<a name="l00398"></a>00398     <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> a;
<a name="l00399"></a>00399 
<a name="l00400"></a>00400         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#b37e84980fd909eeb65ff21268a9e5ac">kmVec3Assign</a>(&amp;v1, vec1);
<a name="l00401"></a>00401         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#b37e84980fd909eeb65ff21268a9e5ac">kmVec3Assign</a>(&amp;v2, vec2);
<a name="l00402"></a>00402 
<a name="l00403"></a>00403         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(&amp;v1, &amp;v1);
<a name="l00404"></a>00404         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(&amp;v2, &amp;v2);
<a name="l00405"></a>00405 
<a name="l00406"></a>00406         a = <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7ed6bea8c65144ef31156825aea0b3e5">kmVec3Dot</a>(&amp;v1, &amp;v2);
<a name="l00407"></a>00407 
<a name="l00408"></a>00408         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (a &gt;= 1.0) {
<a name="l00409"></a>00409                 <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#565c225c463f346c3d517fe06e63e907" title="Returns the inverse of the passed Quaternion.">kmQuaternionIdentity</a>(pOut);
<a name="l00410"></a>00410                 <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00411"></a>00411         }
<a name="l00412"></a>00412 
<a name="l00413"></a>00413         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (a &lt; (1e-6f - 1.0f)) {
<a name="l00414"></a>00414                 <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (fabs(<a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#aabb0b5f2fc888052679d401852e63a9">kmVec3LengthSq</a>(fallback)) &lt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) {
<a name="l00415"></a>00415                         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#c7d1fb61003bc4f8c585ddeb8952d0da" title="Creates a quaternion from a rotation matrix.">kmQuaternionRotationAxis</a>(pOut, fallback, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#93b818860b7ffda66053f0c18b9c1fd2">kmPI</a>);
<a name="l00416"></a>00416                 } <span class="keywordflow">else</span> {
<a name="l00417"></a>00417                         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> axis;
<a name="l00418"></a>00418                         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> X;
<a name="l00419"></a>00419                         X.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = 1.0;
<a name="l00420"></a>00420                         X.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00421"></a>00421                         X.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00422"></a>00422 
<a name="l00423"></a>00423 
<a name="l00424"></a>00424                         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;axis, &amp;X, vec1);
<a name="l00425"></a>00425 
<a name="l00426"></a>00426                         <span class="comment">//If axis is zero</span>
<a name="l00427"></a>00427                         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (fabs(<a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#aabb0b5f2fc888052679d401852e63a9">kmVec3LengthSq</a>(&amp;axis)) &lt; <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) {
<a name="l00428"></a>00428                                 <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> Y;
<a name="l00429"></a>00429                                 Y.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00430"></a>00430                                 Y.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = 1.0;
<a name="l00431"></a>00431                                 Y.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = 0.0;
<a name="l00432"></a>00432 
<a name="l00433"></a>00433                                 <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;axis, &amp;Y, vec1);
<a name="l00434"></a>00434                         }
<a name="l00435"></a>00435 
<a name="l00436"></a>00436                         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(&amp;axis, &amp;axis);
<a name="l00437"></a>00437 
<a name="l00438"></a>00438                         <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#c7d1fb61003bc4f8c585ddeb8952d0da" title="Creates a quaternion from a rotation matrix.">kmQuaternionRotationAxis</a>(pOut, &amp;axis, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#93b818860b7ffda66053f0c18b9c1fd2">kmPI</a>);
<a name="l00439"></a>00439                 }
<a name="l00440"></a>00440         } <span class="keywordflow">else</span> {
<a name="l00441"></a>00441                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s = sqrtf((1+a) * 2);
<a name="l00442"></a>00442                 <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> invs = 1 / s;
<a name="l00443"></a>00443 
<a name="l00444"></a>00444                 <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> c;
<a name="l00445"></a>00445                 <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;c, &amp;v1, &amp;v2);
<a name="l00446"></a>00446 
<a name="l00447"></a>00447                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a> = c.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * invs;
<a name="l00448"></a>00448                 pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a> = c.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * invs;
<a name="l00449"></a>00449         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a> = c.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * invs;
<a name="l00450"></a>00450         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a> = s * 0.5f;
<a name="l00451"></a>00451 
<a name="l00452"></a>00452                 <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#444a545910d9e562e936dfad0b715a72" title="Rotates a quaternion around an axis.">kmQuaternionNormalize</a>(pOut, pOut);
<a name="l00453"></a>00453         }
<a name="l00454"></a>00454 
<a name="l00455"></a>00455         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00456"></a>00456 
<a name="l00457"></a>00457 }
<a name="l00458"></a>00458 
<a name="l00459"></a><a class="code" href="quaternion_8h.html#5d2047e47acff81e6c04cfe72c352636">00459</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="quaternion_8c.html#5d2047e47acff81e6c04cfe72c352636">kmQuaternionMultiplyVec3</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html">kmQuaternion</a>* q, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* v) {
<a name="l00460"></a>00460         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> uv, uuv, qvec;
<a name="l00461"></a>00461 
<a name="l00462"></a>00462         qvec.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = q-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#e9cf860e36fa206f8c122f084ab7042d">x</a>;
<a name="l00463"></a>00463         qvec.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = q-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#6cb097db1a5e24c5e6d7a673dd9b5c68">y</a>;
<a name="l00464"></a>00464         qvec.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = q-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#63b2d2685be9e41190fdf45bf21e6690">z</a>;
<a name="l00465"></a>00465 
<a name="l00466"></a>00466         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;uv, &amp;qvec, v);
<a name="l00467"></a>00467         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(&amp;uuv, &amp;qvec, &amp;uv);
<a name="l00468"></a>00468 
<a name="l00469"></a>00469         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#340a910a28c1b7bec6c55fb7072e331f">kmVec3Scale</a>(&amp;uv, &amp;uv, (2.0f * q-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_quaternion.html#3278d1a1de6f6d29ca9fa08bde51e726">w</a>));
<a name="l00470"></a>00470         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#340a910a28c1b7bec6c55fb7072e331f">kmVec3Scale</a>(&amp;uuv, &amp;uuv, 2.0f);
<a name="l00471"></a>00471 
<a name="l00472"></a>00472         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#eec93a828519b0ecdd20942463598c5e">kmVec3Add</a>(pOut, v, &amp;uv);
<a name="l00473"></a>00473         <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#eec93a828519b0ecdd20942463598c5e">kmVec3Add</a>(pOut, pOut, &amp;uuv);
<a name="l00474"></a>00474 
<a name="l00475"></a>00475         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00476"></a>00476 }
<a name="l00477"></a>00477

<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Creates a quaternion from a rotation matrix.  <a href="#c7d1fb61003bc4f8c585ddeb8952d0da"></a><br></td></tr>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Adapted from the OGRE engine!<p>
Gets the shortest arc quaternion to rotate this vector to the destination vector. <dl class="remark" compact><dt><b>Remarks:</b></dt><dd>If you call this with a dest vector that is close to the inverse of this vector, we will rotate 180 degrees around the 'fallbackAxis' (if specified, or a generated axis if not) since in this case ANY axis of rotation is valid. </dd></dl>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html#l00395">395</a> of file <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html">quaternion.c</a>.</p>

<p>
Returns pOut, sets pOut to the conjugate of pIn. 
<p>
Returns pOut, sets pOut to the conjugate of pIn.<p>
Returns the dot product of the 2 quaternions

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Adapted from the OGRE engine!<p>
Gets the shortest arc quaternion to rotate this vector to the destination vector. <dl class="remark" compact><dt><b>Remarks:</b></dt><dd>If you call this with a dest vector that is close to the inverse of this vector, we will rotate 180 degrees around the 'fallbackAxis' (if specified, or a generated axis if not) since in this case ANY axis of rotation is valid. </dd></dl>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html#l00395">395</a> of file <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html">quaternion.c</a>.</p>

<p>References <a class="el" href="utility_8h-source.html#l00046">kmEpsilon</a>, <a class="el" href="utility_8h-source.html#l00043">kmPI</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html#l00066">kmQuaternionIdentity()</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html#l00152">kmQuaternionNormalize()</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8c-source.html#l00163">kmQuaternionRotationAxis()</a>, <a class="el" href="utility_8h-source.html#l00032">kmScalar</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00283">kmVec3Assign()</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00091">kmVec3Cross()</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00110">kmVec3Dot()</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00062">kmVec3LengthSq()</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00071">kmVec3Normalize()</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8h-source.html#l00044">kmQuaternion::w</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8h-source.html#l00041">kmQuaternion::x</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00038">kmVec3::x</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8h-source.html#l00042">kmQuaternion::y</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00039">kmVec3::y</a>, <a class="el" href="quaternion_8h-source.html#l00043">kmQuaternion::z</a>, and <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00040">kmVec3::z</a>.</p>

}

}

{
   float            : right;
}

{
   float            : left;
   background       : url("tab_r.gif") no-repeat right top;

   font-size        : x-small;
   font-weight      : bold;
   text-decoration  : none;
}

{
   background-position: 100% -150px;
}

{
       color: #1A419D;
}

{

}

}

DIV.tabs SPAN {float : none;}
/* End IE5-Mac hack */

<a name="l00027"></a>00027 
<a name="l00031"></a><a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">00031</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(<a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s) {

<a name="l00040"></a>00040 }
<a name="l00041"></a>00041 
<a name="l00045"></a><a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#10cf11f45b8ce07219996467c7a27d10">00045</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#10cf11f45b8ce07219996467c7a27d10">kmRadiansToDegrees</a>(<a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> radians) {

<p>
<a href="utility_8c-source.html">Go to the source code of this file.</a><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<tr><td class="memItemLeft" nowrap align="right" valign="top">kmScalar&nbsp;</td><td class="memItemRight" valign="bottom"><a class="el" href="utility_8c.html#b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34">kmDegreesToRadians</a> (kmScalar degrees)</td></tr>

<tr><td class="memItemLeft" nowrap align="right" valign="top">kmScalar&nbsp;</td><td class="memItemRight" valign="bottom"><a class="el" href="utility_8c.html#10cf11f45b8ce07219996467c7a27d10">kmRadiansToDegrees</a> (kmScalar radians)</td></tr>

</table>
<hr><h2>Function Documentation</h2>
<a class="anchor" name="b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34"></a><!-- doxytag: member="utility.c::kmDegreesToRadians" ref="b0ea21c5e13f71fd8bdcf404c7cbcf34" args="(kmScalar degrees)" -->
<div class="memitem">
<div class="memproto">
      <table class="memname">
        <tr>
          <td class="memname">kmScalar kmDegreesToRadians           </td>
          <td>(</td>
          <td class="paramtype">kmScalar&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>degrees</em>          </td>
          <td>&nbsp;)&nbsp;</td>
          <td></td>
        </tr>
      </table>
</div>
<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Returns degrees as radians.

<a name="l00033"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#6e5824cbe0226fd978ea257d00e0b492">00033</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#6e5824cbe0226fd978ea257d00e0b492">kmVec2Fill</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> x, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> y)

<a name="l00037"></a>00037     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00038"></a>00038 }

<a name="l00040"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#a1d64021d70723fbd396daceb9d39ec9">00040</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#a1d64021d70723fbd396daceb9d39ec9" title="Returns the length of the vector.">kmVec2Length</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00041"></a>00041 {
<a name="l00042"></a>00042     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> sqrtf(<a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a>));
<a name="l00043"></a>00043 }
<a name="l00044"></a>00044

<a name="l00050"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#4b27a32dd14b8177893e3d5f8a66aed1">00050</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#4b27a32dd14b8177893e3d5f8a66aed1" title="Returns the vector passed in set to unit length.">kmVec2Normalize</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00051"></a>00051 {
<a name="l00052"></a>00052         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> l = 1.0f / <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#a1d64021d70723fbd396daceb9d39ec9" title="Returns the length of the vector.">kmVec2Length</a>(pIn);
<a name="l00053"></a>00053 
<a name="l00054"></a>00054         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> *= l;
<a name="l00055"></a>00055         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> *= l;
<a name="l00056"></a>00056 
<a name="l00057"></a>00057         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00058"></a>00058 }
<a name="l00059"></a>00059 
<a name="l00060"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#d8070ed15103ae246c6f56297fe8aa48">00060</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#d8070ed15103ae246c6f56297fe8aa48" title="Adds 2 vectors and returns the result.">kmVec2Add</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00061"></a>00061 {
<a name="l00062"></a>00062         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> + pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a>;
<a name="l00063"></a>00063         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> + pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a>;
<a name="l00064"></a>00064 
<a name="l00065"></a>00065         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00066"></a>00066 }
<a name="l00067"></a>00067 
<a name="l00068"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#f754f90e8a029560b7e010d2bcaa7045">00068</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#f754f90e8a029560b7e010d2bcaa7045">kmVec2Dot</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00069"></a>00069 {
<a name="l00070"></a>00070     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a>;
<a name="l00071"></a>00071 }
<a name="l00072"></a>00072 
<a name="l00073"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#ea30f710886d29c4e5abe304c7cc16d3">00073</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#ea30f710886d29c4e5abe304c7cc16d3" title="Subtracts 2 vectors and returns the result.">kmVec2Subtract</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00074"></a>00074 {
<a name="l00075"></a>00075         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a>;
<a name="l00076"></a>00076         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a>;
<a name="l00077"></a>00077 
<a name="l00078"></a>00078         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00079"></a>00079 }
<a name="l00080"></a>00080 
<a name="l00081"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#848419ca26661dc0079064dbf89f1d1a">00081</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#848419ca26661dc0079064dbf89f1d1a">kmVec2Transform</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)

<a name="l00092"></a>00092 
<a name="l00093"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#618ee8bafd190b61fffb03304740a759">00093</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#618ee8bafd190b61fffb03304740a759" title="Scales a vector to length s.">kmVec2Scale</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* pIn, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s)
<a name="l00094"></a>00094 {
<a name="l00095"></a>00095         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> * s;
<a name="l00096"></a>00096         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> * s;
<a name="l00097"></a>00097 
<a name="l00098"></a>00098         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00099"></a>00099 }
<a name="l00100"></a>00100 
<a name="l00101"></a><a class="code" href="vec2_8h.html#d8ee0b7087d2d62e2ea4ed1d4184eaff">00101</a> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> <a class="code" href="vec2_8c.html#d8ee0b7087d2d62e2ea4ed1d4184eaff" title="Returns 1 if both vectors are equal.">kmVec2AreEqual</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* p1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* p2)
<a name="l00102"></a>00102 {
<a name="l00103"></a>00103         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (
<a name="l00104"></a>00104                                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#8f17399ac844ce3b973d09d28e78429a">x</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00105"></a>00105                                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec2.html#21eee8f77413b24dd6a8a19314d61fed">y</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)
<a name="l00106"></a>00106                         );
<a name="l00107"></a>00107 }

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Subtracts 2 vectors and returns the result. 
<p>
Returns the Dot product which is the cosine of the angle between the two vectors multiplied by their lengths 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec2_8c-source.html#l00073">73</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec2_8c-source.html">vec2.c</a>.</p>

          <td class="memname"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a>* kmVec2Transform           </td>

          <td class="paramtype"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a> *&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>pOut</em>, </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td class="paramkey"></td>
          <td></td>
          <td class="paramtype">const <a class="el" href="structkm_vec2.html">kmVec2</a> *&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>pV1</em>, </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td class="paramkey"></td>
          <td></td>
          <td class="paramtype">const struct <a class="el" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a> *&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>pM</em></td><td>&nbsp;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>)</td>
          <td></td><td></td><td></td>
        </tr>
      </table>
</div>
<div class="memdoc">

<p>

<a class="anchor" name="9dc27c660a68f5e73194e70a1c655106"></a><!-- doxytag: member="vec2.h::kmVec2TransformCoord" ref="9dc27c660a68f5e73194e70a1c655106" args="(kmVec2 *pOut, const kmVec2 *pV, const struct kmMat4 *pM)" -->
<div class="memitem">

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Transforms a 3D vector by a given matrix, projecting the result back into w = 1. 
<p>
Transform the Vector 
</div>
</div><p>
</div>
