```html
<a name="l00030"></a>00030 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;assert.h&gt;</span>
<a name="l00031"></a>00031 <span class="preprocessor">#include &lt;memory.h&gt;</span>
<a name="l00032"></a>00032 
<a name="l00033"></a>00033 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="utility_8h.html">utility.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00034"></a>00034 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html">vec4.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00035"></a>00035 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="mat4_8h.html">mat4.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00036"></a>00036 <span class="preprocessor">#include "<a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html">vec3.h</a>"</span>
<a name="l00037"></a>00037 
<a name="l00042"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#327a16c25be8c921f5c8710e14c4fdcd">00042</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#327a16c25be8c921f5c8710e14c4fdcd">kmVec3Fill</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> x, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> y, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> z)
<a name="l00043"></a>00043 {
<a name="l00044"></a>00044     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = x;
<a name="l00045"></a>00045     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = y;
<a name="l00046"></a>00046     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = z;
<a name="l00047"></a>00047     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00048"></a>00048 }
<a name="l00049"></a>00049 
<a name="l00050"></a>00050 
<a name="l00054"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#8e019f2b3549e0dc7b9847868ba548fa">00054</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#8e019f2b3549e0dc7b9847868ba548fa">kmVec3Length</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00055"></a>00055 {
<a name="l00056"></a>00056         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> sqrtf(<a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>));
<a name="l00057"></a>00057 }
<a name="l00058"></a>00058 
<a name="l00062"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#aabb0b5f2fc888052679d401852e63a9">00062</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#aabb0b5f2fc888052679d401852e63a9">kmVec3LengthSq</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00063"></a>00063 {
<a name="l00064"></a>00064         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>);
<a name="l00065"></a>00065 }
<a name="l00066"></a>00066 
<a name="l00071"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">00071</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#61a55fc5e4ce21322cb8141653a1d0ff">kmVec3Normalize</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pIn)
<a name="l00072"></a>00072 {
<a name="l00073"></a>00073         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> l = 1.0f / <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#8e019f2b3549e0dc7b9847868ba548fa">kmVec3Length</a>(pIn);
<a name="l00074"></a>00074 
<a name="l00075"></a>00075         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00076"></a>00076         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * l;
<a name="l00077"></a>00077         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * l;
<a name="l00078"></a>00078         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * l;
<a name="l00079"></a>00079 
<a name="l00080"></a>00080         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00081"></a>00081         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00082"></a>00082         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00083"></a>00083 
<a name="l00084"></a>00084         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00085"></a>00085 }
<a name="l00086"></a>00086 
<a name="l00091"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">00091</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#2b3ed559520bc2071b05f40b29f343e6">kmVec3Cross</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00092"></a>00092 {
<a name="l00093"></a>00093 
<a name="l00094"></a>00094         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00095"></a>00095 
<a name="l00096"></a>00096         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>) - (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>);
<a name="l00097"></a>00097         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>) - (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>);
<a name="l00098"></a>00098         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>) - (pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>);
<a name="l00099"></a>00099 
<a name="l00100"></a>00100         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00101"></a>00101         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00102"></a>00102         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00103"></a>00103 
<a name="l00104"></a>00104         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00105"></a>00105 }
<a name="l00106"></a>00106 
<a name="l00110"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#7ed6bea8c65144ef31156825aea0b3e5">00110</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7ed6bea8c65144ef31156825aea0b3e5">kmVec3Dot</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00111"></a>00111 {
<a name="l00112"></a>00112         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (  pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>
<a name="l00113"></a>00113                         + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>
<a name="l00114"></a>00114                         + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> );
<a name="l00115"></a>00115 }
<a name="l00116"></a>00116 
<a name="l00121"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#eec93a828519b0ecdd20942463598c5e">00121</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#eec93a828519b0ecdd20942463598c5e">kmVec3Add</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00122"></a>00122 {
<a name="l00123"></a>00123         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00124"></a>00124 
<a name="l00125"></a>00125         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> + pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00126"></a>00126         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> + pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00127"></a>00127         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> + pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00128"></a>00128 
<a name="l00129"></a>00129         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00130"></a>00130         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00131"></a>00131         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00132"></a>00132 
<a name="l00133"></a>00133         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00134"></a>00134 }
<a name="l00135"></a>00135 
<a name="l00140"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#07cb9ab6d64f4a458191f80eb3405324">00140</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#07cb9ab6d64f4a458191f80eb3405324">kmVec3Subtract</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV2)
<a name="l00141"></a>00141 {
<a name="l00142"></a>00142         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00143"></a>00143 
<a name="l00144"></a>00144         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00145"></a>00145         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00146"></a>00146         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00147"></a>00147 
<a name="l00148"></a>00148         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00149"></a>00149         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00150"></a>00150         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00151"></a>00151 
<a name="l00152"></a>00152         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00153"></a>00153 }
<a name="l00154"></a>00154 
<a name="l00159"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#e0bf920655ecb4211d501af13acaa55b">00159</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#e0bf920655ecb4211d501af13acaa55b">kmVec3Transform</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)
<a name="l00160"></a>00160 {
<a name="l00161"></a>00161         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00162"></a>00162 <span class="comment">                a = (Vx, Vy, Vz, 1)</span>
<a name="l00163"></a>00163 <span class="comment">                b = (a×M)T</span>
<a name="l00164"></a>00164 <span class="comment">                Out = (bx, by, bz)</span>
<a name="l00165"></a>00165 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00166"></a>00166 
<a name="l00167"></a>00167         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00168"></a>00168 
<a name="l00169"></a>00169         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[12];
<a name="l00170"></a>00170         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] + pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[13];
<a name="l00171"></a>00171         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10] + pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[14];
<a name="l00172"></a>00172 
<a name="l00173"></a>00173         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00174"></a>00174         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00175"></a>00175         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00176"></a>00176 
<a name="l00177"></a>00177         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00178"></a>00178 }
<a name="l00179"></a>00179 
<a name="l00180"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7be4f0a32d26fc4e7f293febd6322c78">00180</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7be4f0a32d26fc4e7f293febd6322c78">kmVec3InverseTransform</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pVect, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)
<a name="l00181"></a>00181 {
<a name="l00182"></a>00182         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v1, v2;
<a name="l00183"></a>00183 
<a name="l00184"></a>00184         v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> - pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[12];
<a name="l00185"></a>00185         v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> - pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[13];
<a name="l00186"></a>00186         v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> - pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[14];
<a name="l00187"></a>00187 
<a name="l00188"></a>00188         v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2];
<a name="l00189"></a>00189         v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6];
<a name="l00190"></a>00190         v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] + v1.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10];
<a name="l00191"></a>00191 
<a name="l00192"></a>00192         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00193"></a>00193         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00194"></a>00194         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v2.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00195"></a>00195 
<a name="l00196"></a>00196         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00197"></a>00197 }
<a name="l00198"></a>00198 
<a name="l00199"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#8d949199cbd41558bac73f8f2f43ab5b">00199</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#8d949199cbd41558bac73f8f2f43ab5b">kmVec3InverseTransformNormal</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pVect, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)
<a name="l00200"></a>00200 {
<a name="l00201"></a>00201         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00202"></a>00202 
<a name="l00203"></a>00203         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2];
<a name="l00204"></a>00204         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6];
<a name="l00205"></a>00205         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] + pVect-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10];
<a name="l00206"></a>00206 
<a name="l00207"></a>00207         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00208"></a>00208         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00209"></a>00209         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00210"></a>00210 
<a name="l00211"></a>00211         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00212"></a>00212 }
<a name="l00213"></a>00213 
<a name="l00217"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#43d9ed3e0b77815f8e21a62d70310d43">00217</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#43d9ed3e0b77815f8e21a62d70310d43">kmVec3TransformCoord</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)
<a name="l00218"></a>00218 {
<a name="l00219"></a>00219         <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00220"></a>00220 <span class="comment">        a = (Vx, Vy, Vz, 1)</span>
<a name="l00221"></a>00221 <span class="comment">        b = (a×M)T</span>
<a name="l00222"></a>00222 <span class="comment">        Out = 1⁄bw(bx, by, bz)</span>
<a name="l00223"></a>00223 <span class="comment">        */</span>
<a name="l00224"></a>00224 
<a name="l00225"></a>00225     assert(0 &amp;&amp; <span class="stringliteral">"Not implemented!"</span>);
<a name="l00226"></a>00226 
<a name="l00227"></a>00227         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00228"></a>00228 }
<a name="l00229"></a>00229 
<a name="l00230"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7bcd2c7c5d14ca2dcea701e52450b9d9">00230</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#7bcd2c7c5d14ca2dcea701e52450b9d9">kmVec3TransformNormal</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pV, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM)
<a name="l00231"></a>00231 {
<a name="l00232"></a>00232 <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00233"></a>00233 <span class="comment">    a = (Vx, Vy, Vz, 0)</span>
<a name="l00234"></a>00234 <span class="comment">    b = (a×M)T</span>
<a name="l00235"></a>00235 <span class="comment">    Out = (bx, by, bz)</span>
<a name="l00236"></a>00236 <span class="comment">*/</span>
<a name="l00237"></a>00237 
<a name="l00238"></a>00238         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> v;
<a name="l00239"></a>00239 
<a name="l00240"></a>00240         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8];
<a name="l00241"></a>00241         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9];
<a name="l00242"></a>00242         v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10];
<a name="l00243"></a>00243 
<a name="l00244"></a>00244         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00245"></a>00245         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00246"></a>00246         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = v.<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00247"></a>00247 
<a name="l00248"></a>00248     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00249"></a>00249 
<a name="l00250"></a>00250 }
<a name="l00251"></a>00251 
<a name="l00256"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#340a910a28c1b7bec6c55fb7072e331f">00256</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#340a910a28c1b7bec6c55fb7072e331f">kmVec3Scale</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pIn, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s)
<a name="l00257"></a>00257 {
<a name="l00258"></a>00258         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> * s;
<a name="l00259"></a>00259         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> * s;
<a name="l00260"></a>00260         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> * s;
<a name="l00261"></a>00261 
<a name="l00262"></a>00262         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00263"></a>00263 }
<a name="l00264"></a>00264 
<a name="l00268"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#050b057e12c51103781d5dec80153114">00268</a> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#050b057e12c51103781d5dec80153114">kmVec3AreEqual</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* p1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* p2)
<a name="l00269"></a>00269 {
<a name="l00270"></a>00270         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> ((p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> &lt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> &gt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00271"></a>00271                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> &lt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> &gt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00272"></a>00272                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> &lt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> &gt; (p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>))) {
<a name="l00273"></a>00273                 <span class="keywordflow">return</span> 1;
<a name="l00274"></a>00274         }
<a name="l00275"></a>00275 
<a name="l00276"></a>00276         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> 0;
<a name="l00277"></a>00277 }
<a name="l00278"></a>00278 
<a name="l00283"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#b37e84980fd909eeb65ff21268a9e5ac">00283</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#b37e84980fd909eeb65ff21268a9e5ac">kmVec3Assign</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pIn) {
<a name="l00284"></a>00284         <span class="keywordflow">if</span> (pOut == pIn) {
<a name="l00285"></a>00285                 <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00286"></a>00286         }
<a name="l00287"></a>00287 
<a name="l00288"></a>00288         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a>;
<a name="l00289"></a>00289         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a>;
<a name="l00290"></a>00290         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a>;
<a name="l00291"></a>00291 
<a name="l00292"></a>00292         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00293"></a>00293 }
<a name="l00294"></a>00294 
<a name="l00298"></a><a class="code" href="vec3_8h.html#b1384be1801802bdd4390481ff018400">00298</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* <a class="code" href="vec3_8c.html#b1384be1801802bdd4390481ff018400">kmVec3Zero</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* pOut) {
<a name="l00299"></a>00299         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#800c3571e905feddc73453c652be72fb">x</a> = 0.0f;
<a name="l00300"></a>00300         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#45906c9d76262c5a9dd1c3774ee937eb">y</a> = 0.0f;
<a name="l00301"></a>00301         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec3.html#539514eaeee81aaeee3bb90f7a1581af">z</a> = 0.0f;
<a name="l00302"></a>00302 
<a name="l00303"></a>00303         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00304"></a>00304 }
```

```html
<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Scales a vector to length s. Does not normalize first, you should do that! 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00256">256</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html">vec3.c</a>.</p>

<p>References <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00038">kmVec3::x</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00039">kmVec3::y</a>, and <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00040">kmVec3::z</a>.</p>

<a class="anchor" name="b1384be1801802bdd4390481ff018400"></a><!-- doxytag: member="vec3.h::kmVec3Zero" ref="b1384be1801802bdd4390481ff018400" args="(kmVec3 *pOut)" -->
<div class="memitem">
<div class="memproto">
      <table class="memname">
        <tr>
          <td class="memname"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a>* kmVec3Zero           </td>
          <td>(</td>
          <td class="paramtype"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec3.html">kmVec3</a> *&nbsp;</td>
          <td class="paramname"> <em>pOut</em>          </td>
          <td>&nbsp;)&nbsp;</td>
          <td></td>
        </tr>
      </table>
</div>
<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Sets all the elements of pOut to zero. Returns pOut. 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html#l00298">298</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec3_8c-source.html">vec3.c</a>.</p>

<p>References <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00038">kmVec3::x</a>, <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00039">kmVec3::y</a>, and <a class="el" href="vec3_8h-source.html#l00040">kmVec3::z</a>.</p>
```

```html
<a name="l00035"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#40c25a398ba4520f8a0bd3659aaf85e5">00035</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#40c25a398ba4520f8a0bd3659aaf85e5">kmVec4Fill</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> x, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> y, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> z, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> w)
<a name="l00036"></a>00036 {
<a name="l00037"></a>00037     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> = x;
<a name="l00038"></a>00038     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> = y;
<a name="l00039"></a>00039     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> = z;
<a name="l00040"></a>00040     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> = w;
<a name="l00041"></a>00041     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00042"></a>00042 }
<a name="l00043"></a>00043 
<a name="l00044"></a>00044 
<a name="l00047"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#169473a5a582f6c40a6ec785d017125e">00047</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#169473a5a582f6c40a6ec785d017125e">kmVec4Add</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV2) {
<a name="l00048"></a>00048         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a>;
<a name="l00049"></a>00049         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a>;
<a name="l00050"></a>00050         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a>;
<a name="l00051"></a>00051         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a>;
<a name="l00052"></a>00052 
<a name="l00053"></a>00053         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00054"></a>00054 }
<a name="l00055"></a>00055 
<a name="l00056"></a>00056 <span class="comment">/*</span>
<a name="l00057"></a>00057 <span class="comment">kmVec4* kmVec4Cross(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pV1, const kmVec4* pV2, const kmVec4* pV3)</span>
<a name="l00058"></a>00058 <span class="comment">{</span>
<a name="l00059"></a>00059 <span class="comment">        pOut-&gt;x = pV1-&gt;y * (pV2-&gt;z * pV3-&gt;w - pV3-&gt;z * pV2-&gt;w) - pV1-&gt;z * (pV2-&gt;</span>
<a name="l00060"></a>00060 <span class="comment">        pOut-&gt;y =</span>
<a name="l00061"></a>00061 <span class="comment">        pOut-&gt;z =</span>
<a name="l00062"></a>00062 <span class="comment">        pOut-&gt;w =</span>
<a name="l00063"></a>00063 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00064"></a>00064 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00065"></a>00065 <span class="comment">| i  j  k  l  |   | ay*(bz*cw - cz*bw) - az*(by*cw - cy*bw) + aw*(by*cz - cy*bz) |</span>
<a name="l00066"></a>00066 <span class="comment">| ax ay az aw |   |-ax*(bz*cw - cz*bw) + az*(bx*cw - cx*bw) - aw*(bx*cz - cx*bz) |</span>
<a name="l00067"></a>00067 <span class="comment">| bx by bz bw | = | ax*(by*cw - cy*bw) - ay*(bx*cw - cx*bw) + aw*(bx*cy - cx*by) |</span>
<a name="l00068"></a>00068 <span class="comment">| cx cy cz cw |   |-ax*(by*cz - cy*bz) + ay*(bx*cz - cx*bz) - az*(bx*cy - cx*by) |</span>
<a name="l00069"></a>00069 <span class="comment"></span>
<a name="l00070"></a>00070 <span class="comment">        return pOut;</span>
<a name="l00071"></a>00071 <span class="comment">}*/</span>
<a name="l00072"></a>00072 
<a name="l00074"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#a44b996a0ea4900c28970be39ab288a0">00074</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#a44b996a0ea4900c28970be39ab288a0" title="Returns the dot product of 2 4D vectors.">kmVec4Dot</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV2) {
<a name="l00075"></a>00075         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (  pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a>
<a name="l00076"></a>00076                         + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a>
<a name="l00077"></a>00077                         + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a>
<a name="l00078"></a>00078                         + pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> * pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> );
<a name="l00079"></a>00079 }
<a name="l00080"></a>00080 
<a name="l00083"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#e933688fd2007098087e2e5a6535f0b5">00083</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#e933688fd2007098087e2e5a6535f0b5">kmVec4Length</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pIn) {
<a name="l00084"></a>00084         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> sqrtf(<a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a>));
<a name="l00085"></a>00085 }
<a name="l00086"></a>00086 
<a name="l00088"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#cfedf24d8275c073b795bffe3f5bccdf">00088</a> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#cfedf24d8275c073b795bffe3f5bccdf" title="Returns the length of the 4D vector squared.">kmVec4LengthSq</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pIn) {
<a name="l00089"></a>00089         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a>) + <a class="code" href="utility_8c.html#baccba26e1ee8a40c74692818ae84fd4">kmSQR</a>(pIn-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a>);
<a name="l00090"></a>00090 }
<a name="l00091"></a>00091 
<a name="l00093"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#9ae5e748ca1b79338cee4df3ea9476d0">00093</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#9ae5e748ca1b79338cee4df3ea9476d0" title="Returns the interpolation of 2 4D vectors based on t. Currently not implemented!">kmVec4Lerp</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV2, <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> t) {
<a name="l00094"></a>00094     assert(0);
<a name="l00095"></a>00095     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00096"></a>00096 }
<a name="l00097"></a>00097 
<a name="l00099"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#84b2663c15dd61084ba4eb823d7d8b9a">00099</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#84b2663c15dd61084ba4eb823d7d8b9a" title="Normalizes a 4D vector. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned.">kmVec4Normalize</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pIn) {
<a name="l00100"></a>00100         <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> l = 1.0f / <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#e933688fd2007098087e2e5a6535f0b5">kmVec4Length</a>(pIn);
<a name="l00101"></a>00101 
<a name="l00102"></a>00102         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> *= l;
<a name="l00103"></a>00103         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> *= l;
<a name="l00104"></a>00104         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> *= l;
<a name="l00105"></a>00105         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> *= l;
<a name="l00106"></a>00106 
<a name="l00107"></a>00107         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00108"></a>00108 }
<a name="l00109"></a>00109 
<a name="l00111"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#2876901744a2d8d76af0371686b94f30">00111</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#2876901744a2d8d76af0371686b94f30" title="Scales a vector to the required length. This performs a Normalize before multiplying...">kmVec4Scale</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pIn, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#13c982467de32cab64560329cae90bdd">kmScalar</a> s) {
<a name="l00112"></a>00112         <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#84b2663c15dd61084ba4eb823d7d8b9a" title="Normalizes a 4D vector. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned.">kmVec4Normalize</a>(pOut, pIn);
<a name="l00113"></a>00113 
<a name="l00114"></a>00114         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> *= s;
<a name="l00115"></a>00115         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> *= s;
<a name="l00116"></a>00116         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> *= s;
<a name="l00117"></a>00117         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> *= s;
<a name="l00118"></a>00118         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00119"></a>00119 }
<a name="l00120"></a>00120 
<a name="l00122"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#b00d4f149b28ca04eed6d0fc8d46a52b">00122</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#b00d4f149b28ca04eed6d0fc8d46a52b" title="Subtracts one 4D pV2 from pV1. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned.">kmVec4Subtract</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV2) {
<a name="l00123"></a>00123         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a>;
<a name="l00124"></a>00124         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a>;
<a name="l00125"></a>00125         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a>;
<a name="l00126"></a>00126         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> = pV1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> - pV2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a>;
<a name="l00127"></a>00127 
<a name="l00128"></a>00128         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00129"></a>00129 }
<a name="l00130"></a>00130 
<a name="l00132"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#06c0e36923c94a96a1a5f17bce00d770">00132</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#06c0e36923c94a96a1a5f17bce00d770" title="Transforms a 4D vector by a matrix, the result is stored in pOut, and pOut is returned...">kmVec4Transform</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM) {
<a name="l00133"></a>00133         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[0] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[4] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[8] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[12];
<a name="l00134"></a>00134         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[1] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[5] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[9] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[13];
<a name="l00135"></a>00135         pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[2] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[6] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[10] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[14];
<a name="l00136"></a>00136     pOut-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> = pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[3] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[7] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[11] + pV-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> * pM-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html#39a393fbd31604045d69a6af0fa3b34a">mat</a>[15];
<a name="l00137"></a>00137         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00138"></a>00138 }
<a name="l00139"></a>00139 
<a name="l00141"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#096496ba55b4b63ac4a443ee5dbaf900">00141</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#096496ba55b4b63ac4a443ee5dbaf900" title="Loops through an input array transforming each vec4 by the matrix.">kmVec4TransformArray</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keywordtype">unsigned</span> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> outStride,
<a name="l00142"></a>00142                         <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pV, <span class="keywordtype">unsigned</span> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> vStride, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a>* pM, <span class="keywordtype">unsigned</span> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> count) {
<a name="l00143"></a>00143     <span class="keywordtype">unsigned</span> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> i = 0;
<a name="l00144"></a>00144     <span class="comment">//Go through all of the vectors</span>
<a name="l00145"></a>00145     <span class="keywordflow">while</span> (i &lt; count) {
<a name="l00146"></a>00146         <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* in = pV + (i * vStride); <span class="comment">//Get a pointer to the current input</span>
<a name="l00147"></a>00147         <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* out = pOut + (i * outStride); <span class="comment">//and the current output</span>
<a name="l00148"></a>00148         <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#06c0e36923c94a96a1a5f17bce00d770" title="Transforms a 4D vector by a matrix, the result is stored in pOut, and pOut is returned...">kmVec4Transform</a>(out, in, pM); <span class="comment">//Perform transform on it</span>
<a name="l00149"></a>00149         ++i;
<a name="l00150"></a>00150     }
<a name="l00151"></a>00151 
<a name="l00152"></a>00152     <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00153"></a>00153 }
<a name="l00154"></a>00154 
<a name="l00155"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#8d853e24f0a191f4d1a40a310a5957f0">00155</a> <span class="keywordtype">int</span> <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#8d853e24f0a191f4d1a40a310a5957f0">kmVec4AreEqual</a>(<span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* p1, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* p2) {
<a name="l00156"></a>00156         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> (
<a name="l00157"></a>00157                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#2f05daa4b1ff4cdb6f5340d0ff28c6ac">x</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00158"></a>00158                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#166ea934d56eca30a97b190d365b62b8">y</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00159"></a>00159                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#f4e022632723b68a304ac40d308cceab">z</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>) &amp;&amp;
<a name="l00160"></a>00160                 (p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> &lt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> + <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a> &amp;&amp; p1-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> &gt; p2-&gt;<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html#b002db65c3793806ec266f2cc348879f">w</a> - <a class="code" href="utility_8h.html#1e85e20764f0770ea221a5f2b423d669">kmEpsilon</a>)
<a name="l00161"></a>00161         );
<a name="l00162"></a>00162 }
<a name="l00163"></a>00163 
<a name="l00164"></a><a class="code" href="vec4_8h.html#e04662d851b9d454d8366a3eebb16096">00164</a> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* <a class="code" href="vec4_8c.html#e04662d851b9d454d8366a3eebb16096">kmVec4Assign</a>(<a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pOut, <span class="keyword">const</span> <a class="code" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a>* pIn) {
<a name="l00165"></a>00165         assert(pOut != pIn);
<a name="l00166"></a>00166 
<a name="l00167"></a>00167         memcpy(pOut, pIn, <span class="keyword">sizeof</span>(<span class="keywordtype">float</span>) * 4);
<a name="l00168"></a>00168 
<a name="l00169"></a>00169         <span class="keywordflow">return</span> pOut;
<a name="l00170"></a>00170 }
<a name="l00171"></a>00171
```

```html
<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Normalizes a 4D vector. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned.  <a href="#84b2663c15dd61084ba4eb823d7d8b9a"></a><br></td></tr>

<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Scales a vector to the required length. This performs a Normalize before multiplying by S.  <a href="#2876901744a2d8d76af0371686b94f30"></a><br></td></tr>
<tr><td class="memItemLeft" nowrap align="right" valign="top"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *&nbsp;</td><td class="memItemRight" valign="bottom"><a class="el" href="vec4_8c.html#b00d4f149b28ca04eed6d0fc8d46a52b">kmVec4Subtract</a> (<a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *pOut, const <a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *pV1, const <a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *pV2)</td></tr>

<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Subtracts one 4D pV2 from pV1. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned.  <a href="#b00d4f149b28ca04eed6d0fc8d46a52b"></a><br></td></tr>
<tr><td class="memItemLeft" nowrap align="right" valign="top"><a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *&nbsp;</td><td class="memItemRight" valign="bottom"><a class="el" href="vec4_8c.html#06c0e36923c94a96a1a5f17bce00d770">kmVec4Transform</a> (<a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *pOut, const <a class="el" href="structkm_vec4.html">kmVec4</a> *pV, const <a class="el" href="structkm_mat4.html">kmMat4</a> *pM)</td></tr>

<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Transforms a 4D vector by a matrix, the result is stored in pOut, and pOut is returned.  <a href="#06c0e36923c94a96a1a5f17bce00d770"></a><br></td></tr>

<tr><td class="mdescLeft">&nbsp;</td><td class="mdescRight">Loops through an input array transforming each vec4 by the matrix.  <a href="#096496ba55b4b63ac4a443ee5dbaf900"></a><br></td></tr>

<p>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Subtracts one 4D pV2 from pV1. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned. 
<p>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00122">122</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html">vec4.c</a>.</p>

<p>References <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00040">kmVec4::w</a>, <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00037">kmVec4::x</a>, <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00038">kmVec4::y</a>, and <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00039">kmVec4::z</a>.</p>

</div>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Transforms a 4D vector by a matrix, the result is stored in pOut, and pOut is returned. 
<p>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00132">132</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html">vec4.c</a>.</p>

<p>References <a class="el" href="mat4_8h-source.html#l00044">kmMat4::mat</a>, <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00040">kmVec4::w</a>, <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00037">kmVec4::x</a>, <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00038">kmVec4::y</a>, and <a class="el" href="vec4_8h-source.html#l00039">kmVec4::z</a>.</p>

<p>Referenced by <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00141">kmVec4TransformArray()</a>.</p>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Loops through an input array transforming each vec4 by the matrix. 
<p>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00141">141</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html">vec4.c</a>.</p>
```

```html
<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Adds 2 4D vectors together. The result is store in pOut, the function returns pOut so that it can be nested in another function. 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00047">47</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html">vec4.c</a>.</p>

<div class="memdoc">

<p>
Subtracts one 4D pV2 from pV1. The result is stored in pOut. pOut is returned. 
<p>

<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html#l00122">122</a> of file <a class="el" href="vec4_8c-source.html">vec4.c</a>.</p>
```

`docs/latex/Makefile`:

```
all: clean refman.pdf

pdf: refman.pdf

refman.pdf: refman.tex
	pdflatex refman.tex
	makeindex refman.idx
	pdflatex refman.tex
	latex_count=5 ; \
	while egrep -s 'Rerun (LaTeX|to get cross-references right)' refman.log && [ $$latex_count -gt 0 ] ;\
	    do \
	      echo "Rerunning latex...." ;\
	      pdflatex refman.tex ;\
	      latex_count=`expr $$latex_count - 1` ;\
	    done


clean:
	rm -f *.ps *.dvi *.aux *.toc *.idx *.ind *.ilg *.log *.out refman.pdf

```

```sty
\NeedsTeXFormat{LaTeX2e}
\ProvidesPackage{doxygen}
\RequirePackage{calc}
\RequirePackage{array}
\pagestyle{fancyplain}
\newcommand{\clearemptydoublepage}{\newpage{\pagestyle{empty}\cleardoublepage}}
\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{\markboth{#1}{}}
\renewcommand{\sectionmark}[1]{\markright{\thesection\ #1}}
\lhead[\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\thepage}]
        {\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\rightmark}}
\rhead[\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\leftmark}]
        {\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\thepage}}
\rfoot[\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\scriptsize Generated on Mon Dec 29 18:40:10 2008 for Kazmath by Doxygen }]{}
\lfoot[]{\fancyplain{}{\bfseries\scriptsize Generated on Mon Dec 29 18:40:10 2008 for Kazmath by Doxygen }}
\cfoot{}
\newenvironment{Code}
{\footnotesize}
{\normalsize}
\newcommand{\doxyref}[3]{\textbf{#1} (\textnormal{#2}\,\pageref{#3})}
\newenvironment{DocInclude}
{\footnotesize}
{\normalsize}
\newenvironment{VerbInclude}
{\footnotesize}
{\normalsize}
\newenvironment{Image}
{\begin{figure}[H]}
{\end{figure}}
\newenvironment{ImageNoCaption}{}{}
\newenvironment{CompactList}
{\begin{list}{}{
  \setlength{\leftmargin}{0.5cm}
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\topsep}{0pt}
  \renewcommand{\makelabel}{\hfill}}}
{\end{list}}
\newenvironment{CompactItemize}
{
  \begin{itemize}
  \setlength{\itemsep}{-3pt}
  \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\topsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\partopsep}{0pt}
}
{\end{itemize}}
\newcommand{\PBS}[1]{\let\temp=\\#1\let\\=\temp}
\newlength{\tmplength}
\newenvironment{TabularC}[1]
{
\setlength{\tmplength}
     {\linewidth/(#1)-\tabcolsep*2-\arrayrulewidth*(#1+1)/(#1)}
      \par\begin{tabular*}{\linewidth}
             {*{#1}{|>{\PBS\raggedright\hspace{0pt}}p{\the\tmplength}}|}
}
{\end{tabular*}\par}
\newcommand{\entrylabel}[1]{
   {\parbox[b]{\labelwidth-4pt}{\makebox[0pt][l]{\textbf{#1}}\vspace{1.5\baselineskip}}}}
\newenvironment{Desc}
{\begin{list}{}
  {
    \settowidth{\labelwidth}{40pt}
    \setlength{\leftmargin}{\labelwidth}
    \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
    \setlength{\itemsep}{-4pt}
    \renewcommand{\makelabel}{\entrylabel}
  }
}
{\end{list}}
\newenvironment{Indent}
  {\begin{list}{}{\setlength{\leftmargin}{0.5cm}}
      \item[]\ignorespaces}
  {\unskip\end{list}}
\setlength{\parindent}{0cm}
\setlength{\parskip}{0.2cm}
\addtocounter{secnumdepth}{1}
\sloppy
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
```

```tex
\label{plane_8c_8a74a1d649bcd7438e83e38d8b1640a0}
```

```tex
\label{quaternion_8c_ca700f8ae35c3ad7e812e4dd57848849}


Adapted from the OGRE engine!

Gets the shortest arc quaternion to rotate this vector to the destination vector. \begin{Desc}
\item[Remarks:]If you call this with a dest vector that is close to the inverse of this vector, we will rotate 180 degrees around the 'fallbackAxis' (if specified, or a generated axis if not) since in this case ANY axis of rotation is valid. \end{Desc}
```

```tex
\label{quaternion_8h_ca700f8ae35c3ad7e812e4dd57848849}


Adapted from the OGRE engine!

Gets the shortest arc quaternion to rotate this vector to the destination vector. \begin{Desc}
\item[Remarks:]If you call this with a dest vector that is close to the inverse of this vector, we will rotate 180 degrees around the 'fallbackAxis' (if specified, or a generated axis if not) since in this case ANY axis of rotation is valid. \end{Desc}
```

`java/CMakeLists.txt`:

```txt

FIND_PACKAGE(Java) #Find the java executables

IF(JAVA_FOUND)

FIND_PACKAGE(JNI)

IF(JNI_FOUND)
MESSAGE("Building JNI wrapper")

SET(JKAZMATH_CLASS kazmath/jkazmath.class)
SET(JKAZMATH_HEADER jni/kazmath_jkazmath.h)
SET(JKAZMATH_JAR kazmath.jar)

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE KAZMATH_C_FILES ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/kazmath/*.c ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/jni/*.c)

ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(OUTPUT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${JKAZMATH_CLASS} COMMAND ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/kazmath/jkazmath.java -d ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(OUTPUT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${JKAZMATH_HEADER} COMMAND ${Java_JAVAH_EXECUTABLE} -classpath ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -d jni kazmath.jkazmath DEPENDS ${JKAZMATH_CLASS})

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/jni ${JNI_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/kazmath)

SET(CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS "-lm -lc")
SET(CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON) 

ADD_LIBRARY(Jkazmath SHARED ${KAZMATH_C_FILES} ${JKAZMATH_HEADER})
ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(TARGET Jkazmath POST_BUILD COMMAND ${Java_JAR_EXECUTABLE} cvf kazmath.jar kazmath)

INSTALL(TARGETS Jkazmath LIBRARY DESTINATION ${INSTALL_LIB_DIR})
INSTALL(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/kazmath.jar DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/java)
ELSE(JNI_FOUND)
MESSAGE("Not building JNI wrapper. Couldn't find JNI")
ENDIF(JNI_FOUND)

ENDIF(JAVA_FOUND)

```

`java/jni/kazmath.c`:

```c

/*
* this file is public domain originally written by chris_c (codifies at googles mail)
* by using this source you agree to
* indemnify all authors from all damages and costs involved in the use of this code 
*/

#include "kazmath_jkazmath.h"

#include <aabb2.h>
#include <aabb3.h>
#include <vec3.h>
#include <vec4.h>
#include <mat3.h>
#include <mat4.h>
#include <quaternion.h>
#include <plane.h>
#include <ray2.h>
#include <ray3.h>

#include <assert.h>


// kmVec4* kmVec4Fill(kmVec4* pOut, kmScalar x, kmScalar y, kmScalar z, kmScalar w);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Fill
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jfloat x, jfloat y, jfloat z, jfloat w)
{
    kmVec4* o = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jo);
    kmVec4Fill(o,x,y,z,w);
    return jo;
}

//kmVec4* kmVec4Add(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pV1, const kmVec4* pV2);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Add
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jobject jv1, jobject jv2)
{
    kmVec4* o = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jo);
    kmVec4* v1 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv1);
    kmVec4* v2 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv2);
    kmVec4Add(o,v1,v2);
    return jo;
}

//kmScalar kmVec4Dot(const kmVec4* pV1, const kmVec4* pV2);
JNIEXPORT jfloat JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Dot
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jv1, jobject jv2)
{
    kmVec4* v1 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv1);
    kmVec4* v2 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv2);
    return kmVec4Dot(v1,v2);
}

//kmScalar kmVec4Length(const kmVec4* pIn);
JNIEXPORT jfloat JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Length
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject ji)
{
    kmVec4* i = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, ji);
    return kmVec4Length(i);    
}

  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject ji)
{
    kmVec4* i = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, ji);
    return kmVec4LengthSq(i);

//kmVec4* kmVec4Lerp(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pV1, const kmVec4* pV2, kmScalar t);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Lerp
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jobject jv1, jobject jv2, jfloat t)
{
    kmVec4* o = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jo);
    kmVec4* v1 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv1);
    kmVec4* v2 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv2);
    kmVec4Lerp(o,v1,v2,t);
    return jo;    
}

//kmVec4* kmVec4Normalize(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pIn);

    kmVec4* i = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, ji);
    kmVec4Normalize(o,i);
    return jo;        
}

    kmVec4* i = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, ji);

//kmVec4* kmVec4Subtract(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pV1, const kmVec4* pV2);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Subtract
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jobject jv1, jobject jv2)

    kmVec4* v1 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv1);
    kmVec4* v2 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv2);
    kmVec4Subtract(o,v1,v2);
    return jo;    
}

//kmVec4* kmVec4Transform(kmVec4* pOut, const kmVec4* pV, const struct kmMat4* pM);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4Transform
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jobject jv, jobject jm)

    kmVec4* v = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv);
    kmMat4* m = (kmMat4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jm);
    kmVec4Transform(o,v,m);
    return jo;    
}

//kmVec4* kmVec4TransformArray(kmVec4* pOut, unsigned int outStride,
//			const kmVec4* pV, unsigned int vStride, const struct kmMat4* pM, unsigned int count);
JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4TransformArray
  (JNIEnv *e, jclass c, jobject jo, jint os, jobject jv, jint vs, jobject jm, jint cnt)

    kmVec4* v = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv);
    kmMat4* m = (kmMat4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jm);
    kmVec4TransformArray(o,os,v,vs,m,cnt);            
    return jo;
}

//int 	kmVec4AreEqual(const kmVec4* p1, const kmVec4* p2);
JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_kazmath_jkazmath_kmVec4AreEqual

    kmVec4* v2 = (kmVec4*)(*e)->GetDirectBufferAddress(e, jv2);
    return kmVec4AreEqual(v1,v2);   
}
```
